content: This is a discussion thread for the Clay maths summer school on formalization of class field theory in Lean (here is the annoucement )
Will there be a dedicated channel for the workshop?

Since Kevin is still hiding the channel from us, I am going to use this thread for now. For the people arriving today, if anybody wants to get food (and a drink?) tonight, feel free to dm me or we can arrange something here.
Sorry, I've been having a travel nightmare and woke up in France this morning (which was not part of the plan). I've just made it to Oxford and will set up the channel now
Anyone who wants access please DM me and I'll add you, I'm really sorry not to be more organised but I have a talk to prepare
All my condolences for waking up in France. I know what it is.

I didn't mind it in general (indeed I'd done it quite happily for the week beforehand), it was just the shock that I also had to do it on the day I was expecting to be waking up in London after a good night's sleep and having all day to prepare for the workshop.
